1.title: This Site
1.description: Welcome! I'm currently developing a custom Content Management System (CMS) to deliver a more dynamic and tailored experience. New content and features are on the way, so be sure to check back soon for updates! You can contact me at thomas.haley.2018@gmail.com with any questions or comments.
